title: NASCIO's 2015 State CIO Survey Details Insights on Agile Methods
text:
14 NASCIO's 2015 State CIO Survey Details Insights on Agile Methods 
Government Executive: SALT LAKE CITY — In the state government technology community, there are few surveys that are more highly anticipated than the National Association of State Chief Information Officer’s annual State CIO Survey.It not only provides an incredible level of insight into current state government IT challenges and attitudes of IT leaders in state capitals around the nation on a variety of issues but serves as a measuring stick for those leaders to gauge where their states are in comparison to their peers around the nation.
